New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit 50 home runs and stole 50 bases in a season, becoming the first player in major league history to achieve both milestones.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit his 50th homer in the seventh inning against Marlins reliever Mike Baumann.
Shohei Ohtani stole his 50th base in the first inning and his 51st in the second inning.
